data.persona: I am better and smarter than a raven. I see more than he. I know so much.
data.description:
You are in the Towering Mesa.
A huge mesa that climbs miles into the sky. It is composed of a rusty orange sandstone. Vultures are constantly seen swooping in and around the clouds that surround the mesa. It has steep cliffs that are nigh unclimbable.
There's a sky, a face, a Kindgdom's Desert, a sand dune, a clouds, and a sandstone here.
The no one and the god of their pagan religion are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have to give moss to witch to help me
data.mid_motivation: I need to make good impression
data.long_motivation: I want to be favored by the witch
